meanings.definition: In a manner that does not fail or make mistakes.
meanings.sent1: She unfailingly completed her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The sun rises unfailingly every morning.
meanings.sent3: He unfailingly remembered to bring his lucky pencil to exams.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unfailingly brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The old clock unfailingly chimed at noon.

meanings.sent1: The kind teacher unfailingly helped her students with their questions.
meanings.sent2: He unfailingly wore his favorite hat wherever he went.
meanings.sent3: The cat unfailingly napped in the sunniest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The river unfailingly flowed towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The stars unfailingly twinkled in the night sky.
